column5: does anyone have some hot spots for any bass,pike or pike on the south shore of lake nippissing?if so please share thank you

Dont have any hot spots,but I would recommend you and your dad or mom spend a day on the water with Rob Hyatt or Dany Columby if you regularly visit the area. They are very familliar with Nippising,I suspect you would learn alot from both these guys and enjoy your day  Rob Hyatt http://www.robsfishingcharters.com/  Dany Columby http://www.nipissingmuskies.com/  Might be others on the board which may provide further help
Drop by the local baitshop spend a few bucks and I am sure they will point you in the right direction.

Most of the fishing I've ever done in Nippising has been in the south bay region of the lake and the french river. Smallmouth fishing can be excellent at certain times when they come in fairly shallow! Spinnerbaits, Crankbaits, Grubs, Tubes, WHATEVER! Have fun because fishing there can be absolutely silly.
